scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && haxe hxml/build.js.hxml && vite build
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && haxe hxml/build.js.hxml && mkdir -p dist/ && cp -r out/js/* dist/ && cp -r public/* dist/ && cp index.html dist/index.html && sed -i 's/out\/js\///g' dist/index.html
scripts.deploy: npm run build && rsync -azP --mkpath --delete dist/ dev:testbed/haxe/${npm_package_name}/
